events.message: We have successfully received Jane Doe's application for the software engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Jane's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on her experience and the position she applied for.
Recruiter Mark Smith has been assigned to coordinate the hiring process and communicate with Jane regarding the next steps.
The initial screening call with Jane went well; she demonstrated strong software development knowledge and enthusiasm for the role.
Jane responded promptly to our follow-up questions and expressed availability for a technical interview next week.
The technical interview for Jane has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM with our senior software engineers.
